GP12visnup_u:8752: na vetti paramaṃ rūpaṃ sor'cyate vā kathaṃ mayā // ViP_5,7.67 //
GP12visnup_u:8754: yamarcayanti dhyānena sor'cyate vā kathaṃ mayā // ViP_5,7.68 //
GP12visnup_u:8756: bhāvapuṣpādinā nāthaḥ sorcyate vā kathaṃ mayā // ViP_5,7.69 //
GP12visnup_u:8757: so 'haṃ te devadeveśa nārcanādau stutau na ca /
GP12visnup_u:8761: sṛjyate bhavatā sarvaṃ tathā saṃhrīyate jagat /
GP12visnup_u:8762: jātirūpasvabhāvāś ca sṛjyante sṛ-jatā tvayā // ViP_5,7.72 //
GP12visnup_u:8763: yathāhaṃ bhavatā sṛṣṭo jātyā rūpeṇa ceśvara /
GP12visnup_u:8764: svabhāvena ca sādhutvaṃ tathedaṃ ceṣṭitaṃ mayā // ViP_5,7.73 //
GP12visnup_u:8766: nyāyo daṇḍanipāto vai tavaivavacanaṃ yathā // ViP_5,7.74 //
GP12visnup_u:8768: sa ślāghyo 'yaṃ paro daṇḍas tvatto me nānyato varaḥ // ViP_5,7.75 //
GP12visnup_u:8774: matpadāni ca te sarpa dṛṣṭvā mūrdhani sāgare /
GP12visnup_u:8778: praṇamya so 'pi kṛṣṇāya jagāma payasāṃ nidhim // ViP_5,7.79 //
GP12visnup_u:8782: gopā mūrdhani hārdena siṣicur netrajair jalaiḥ // ViP_5,7.81 //
GP12visnup_u:8784: tuṣṭuvurmuditā gopā dṛṣṭvā śivajalāṃ nadīm // ViP_5,7.82 //
GP12visnup_u:8786: saṃstūyamāno gopaiś ca kṛṣṇo vrajamupāgamat // ViP_5,7.83 //
GP12visnup_u:8790: gāḥ pālayantau ca punaḥ sahitau balakeśavau /
GP12visnup_u:8791: bhramamāṇau vane tasminramyaṃ tālavanaṃ gatau // ViP_5,8.1 //
GP12visnup_u:8792: tattu tālavanaṃ divyaṃ dhenuko nāma dānavaḥ /
GP12visnup_u:8797: he rāma he kṛṣṇa sadā dhenukenaiṣa rakṣyate /
GP12visnup_u:8804: kṛṣṇaś ca pātayāmāsa bhuvitāni phalāni vai // ViP_5,8.6 //
GP12visnup_u:8807: padbhyāmubhābhyāṃ sa tadā paścimābhyāṃ balaṃ balī /
GP12visnup_u:8808: jaghānorasi tābhyāṃ ca sa ca tenābhyagṛhyata // ViP_5,8.8 //
GP12visnup_u:8810: tasminneva sa cikṣepa vegena tṛṇarājani // ViP_5,8.9 //
GP12visnup_u:8814: kṛṣṇaścikṣepa tālāgre balabhadraś ca līlayā // ViP_5,8.11 //
GP12visnup_u:8816: daitya gardabhadehaiś ca maitreya śuśubhe 'dhikam // ViP_5,8.12 //
GP12visnup_u:8823: saumyaṃ tadgopagopīnāṃ ramyaṃ tālavanaṃ babhau // ViP_5,9.1 //
GP12visnup_u:8827: cārayantau ca gā dūre vyāharantau ca nāmabhiḥ // ViP_5,9.3 //
GP12visnup_u:8843: kṛṣṇaṃ tato rauhiṇeyaṃ hantuṃ cakre manoratham // ViP_5,9.11 //
GP12visnup_u:8845: prakurvanto hi te sarve dvaudvau yugapadutthitau // ViP_5,9.12 //
GP12visnup_u:8846: śrīdāmnā saha govindaḥ pralaṃbena tathā balaḥ /
GP12visnup_u:8853: nabhaḥsthalaṃ jagāmāśu sacandra iva vāridaḥ // ViP_5,9.16 //
GP12visnup_u:8855: vavṛdhe sa mahākāyaḥ prāvṛṣīva balāhakaḥ // ViP_5,9.17 //
GP12visnup_u:8872: ātmānamekaṃ tadvacca jagatyekārṇave ca yat // ViP_5,9.24 //
GP12visnup_u:8873: kiṃ na vetsi yathāhaṃ ca tvaṃ caikaṃ kāraṇaṃ bhuvaḥ /
GP12visnup_u:8876: somo manaste śvasitaṃ samīraṇo diśaścatasro 'vyaya bāhavaste // ViP_5,9.26 //
GP12visnup_u:8879: divyaṃ hi rūpaṃ tava vetti nānyo devair aśeṣair avatārarūpam /
GP12visnup_u:8880: tadarcyate vetsi na kiṃ yadante tvayyeva viśvaṃ layamabhyupaiti // ViP_5,9.28 //
GP12visnup_u:8881: tvayā dhṛteyaṃ dharaṇī bibharti carācaraṃ viśvamanantamūrte /
GP12visnup_u:8883: attaṃ yathā vaḍāvavahnināṃbu himasvarūpaṃ parigṛhya kāstam /
GP12visnup_u:8895: tena cāsya prahāreṇa bahiryāte vilocane // ViP_5,9.35 //
GP12visnup_u:8897: nipapāta mahīpṛṣṭhe datya varyo mamāra ca // ViP_5,9.36 //
GP12visnup_u:8900: saṃstūyamāno gopais tu rāmo daitye nipātite /
GP12visnup_u:8912: tatyajuścāṃbaraṃ meghā gṛhaṃ vijñānino yathā // ViP_5,10.4 //
GP12visnup_u:8919: śanakaiḥ śanakais tīraṃ tatyajuś ca jalāśayāḥ /
GP12visnup_u:8921: pūrvaṃ tyaktaiḥ saroṃbhobhir haṃsā yogaṃ punar yayuḥ /
GP12visnup_u:8922: kleśaiḥ kuyogino śeṣair antarāyahatā iva // ViP_5,10.9 //
GP12visnup_u:8926: jñāte sarvagate viṣṇau manāṃsīva sumedhasām // ViP_5,10.11 //
GP12visnup_u:8931: nabhasobdaṃ bhuvaḥ paṅkaṃ kāluṣyaṃ cāṃbhasaḥ śarat /
GP12visnup_u:8939: ko 'yaṃ śakramaho nāma yena vo harṣa āgataḥ /
GP12visnup_u:8940: prāha taṃ nandagopaś ca pṛcchantamatisādaram // ViP_5,10.18 //
GP12visnup_u:8943: tena saṃcoditā meghā varṣatyaṃhumayaṃ rasam // ViP_5,10.19 //
GP12visnup_u:8946: kṣīravatya imā gāvo vatsavatyaś ca nirvṛtāḥ /
GP12visnup_u:8947: tena saṃvardhitaiḥ sasyais tuṣṭāḥ puṣṭāḥ bhavanti vai // ViP_5,10.21 //
GP12visnup_u:8949: dṛśyate yatra dṛsyante vṛṣṭimanto balāhakāḥ // ViP_5,10.22 //
GP12visnup_u:8950: bhaumame tatpayo dugdhaṃ gobhiḥ sūryasya vāridaiḥ /
GP12visnup_u:8953: makhaiḥ sureśamarcanti vayamanye ca mānavāḥ // ViP_5,10.24 //
GP12visnup_u:8957: na vayaṃ kṛṣikartāro vāṇijyājīvino na ca /
GP12visnup_u:8958: gāvosmaddaivataṃ tāta vayaṃ vanacarā yataḥ // ViP_5,10.26 //
GP12visnup_u:8959: ānvikṣikī trayī vārtā daṇḍanitis tathā parā /
GP12visnup_u:8960: vidyā catuṣṭayaṃ caitadvārtamātraṃ śṛṇuṣva me // ViP_5,10.27 //
GP12visnup_u:8962: vidyā hyekā mahābhāga vārtā vṛttitrayāśrayā // ViP_5,10.28 //
GP12visnup_u:8964: asmākaṃ gauḥ parāvṛttirvārtābhedair iyaṃ tribhiḥ // ViP_5,10.29 //
GP12visnup_u:8965: vidyayā yo yayā yuktastasya sā daivataṃ mahat /
GP12visnup_u:8966: saiva pūjyārca nīyā ca saiva tasyopakārikā // ViP_5,10.30 //
GP12visnup_u:8968: iha ca pretya caivāsau na tadāpnoti śobhanam // ViP_5,10.31 //
GP12visnup_u:8969: kṛṣyāntā prathitā sīmā mīmāntaṃ ca punarvanam /
GP12visnup_u:8970: vanāntā girayaḥsarve te cāsmākaṃ parā gatiḥ // ViP_5,10.32 //
GP12visnup_u:8972: sukhinastvakhile loke yathā vai cakracāriṇaḥ // ViP_5,10.33 //
GP12visnup_u:8974: tattadrūpaṃ samāsthāya ramante sveṣu sānuṣu // ViP_5,10.34 //
GP12visnup_u:8975: yadā caite prabādhyante teṣāṃ ye kānanaukasaḥ /
GP12visnup_u:8978: kimasmākaṃ mahendreṇa gāvaḥ śailāś ca devatāḥ // ViP_5,10.36 //
GP12visnup_u:8984: bhojyantāṃ tena vai viprās tathā ye cābhivāñchakāḥ // ViP_5,10.39 //
GP12visnup_u:8988: tataḥ kṛtā bhavetprītirgavāmadres tathā mama // ViP_5,10.41 //
GP12visnup_u:8990: iti tasya vacaḥ śrutvā vandādyāste vrajaukasaḥ /
GP12visnup_u:9001: svenaiva kṛṣṇo rūpeṇa gopaiḥ saha gireḥ śiraḥ /
GP12visnup_u:9003: antardhānaṃ gate tasmingopā labdhvā tato varān /
GP12visnup_u:9004: kṛtvā girīmakhaṃ goṣṭhaṃ nijamabyāyayuḥ punaḥ // ViP_5,10.49 //
GP12visnup_u:9014: ājīvo yāḥ parasteṣāṃ gāvastasya ca kāraṇam /
GP12visnup_u:9019: ityājñaptās tatas tena mumucus te balāhakāḥ /
GP12visnup_u:9021: tataḥ kṣaṇena pṛthivī kakubhoṃbaram eva ca /
GP12visnup_u:9026: adhaścordhvaṃ ca tiryak ca jagadāpyamivābhavat // ViP_5,11.9 //
GP12visnup_u:9029: kroḍena vatsān ākramya tasthur anyā mahāmune /
GP12visnup_u:9030: gāvo vivatsāś ca kṛtā vāripūreṇa cāparāḥ // ViP_5,11.11 //
GP12visnup_u:9045: praviśyatāṃ na bhetavyaṃ girīpātācca nirbhayaiḥ // ViP_5,11.18 //
GP12visnup_u:9053: indreṇa coditā vipra gopānāṃ nāśakāriṇā // ViP_5,11.22 //
GP12visnup_u:9054: tato dhṛte mahāśaile paritrāte ca gokule /
GP12visnup_u:9057: niṣkramya gokulaṃ hṛṣṭaṃ svasthānaṃ punarāgamat // ViP_5,11.24 //
GP12visnup_u:9059: svasthāne vismitamukhair dṛṣṭas tais tu vrajaukasaiḥ // ViP_5,11.25 //
GP12visnup_u:9063: dhṛte govardhane śaile paritrāte ca gokule /
GP12visnup_u:9068: kṛtsnasya jagato gopaṃ vṛtaṃ gopakumārakaiḥ // ViP_5,12.3 //
GP12visnup_u:9075: tvatsamīpaṃ mahābāho naitac cintyaṃ tvāyānyathā // ViP_5,12.6 //
GP12visnup_u:9079: samādiṣṭā mahāmeghāstaiś cedaṃ kadanaṃ kṛtam // ViP_5,12.8 //
GP12visnup_u:9094: prītyā sapraśrayaṃ vākyaṃ punarāha śacīpatiḥ // ViP_5,12.15 //
GP12visnup_u:9099: bhārāvataraṇe sāhyaṃ sa te vīraḥ kariṣyati /
GP12visnup_u:9102: jānāmi bhārate vaṃśe jātaṃ pārthaṃ tavāṃśataḥ /
GP12visnup_u:9105: na tāvadarjunaṃ kaściddevendra yudhi jeṣyati // ViP_5,12.20 //
GP12visnup_u:9107: keśī kuvalayāpīḍo narakādyās tathā pare // ViP_5,12.21 //
GP12visnup_u:9109: tatra viddhi sahasrākṣa bhārāvataraṇaṃ kṛtam // ViP_5,12.22 //
GP12visnup_u:9110: sa tvaṃ gaccha na saṃtāpaṃ putrārthe kartumarhasi /
GP12visnup_u:9113: nivṛtte bhārate yuddhe kuntyai dāsyāmyavikṣatām // ViP_5,12.24 //
GP12visnup_u:9116: āruhyaurāvataṃ nāgaṃ punareva divaṃ yayau // ViP_5,12.25 //
GP12visnup_u:9117: kṛṣṇo hi sahito gobhir gopālaiś ca punarvrajam /
GP12visnup_u:9123: ūcuḥ prītyā dhṛtaṃ dṛṣṭvā tena govardhanācalam // ViP_5,13.1 //
GP12visnup_u:9125: gāvaś ca bhavatā trātā giridhāraṇakarmaṇā // ViP_5,13.2 //
GP12visnup_u:9127: divyaṃ ca bhavataḥ karma kimetattāta kathyatām // ViP_5,13.3 //
GP12visnup_u:9129: dhṛto govardhanaścāyaṃ śaṅkitāni manāṃsi naḥ // ViP_5,13.4 //
GP12visnup_u:9130: satyaṃ satyaṃ hareḥ pādau śapāmo 'mita vikrama /
GP12visnup_u:9131: yathāvadvīryamālokya na tvāṃ manyāmahe naram // ViP_5,13.5 //
GP12visnup_u:9136: devo vā dānavo vā tvaṃ yakṣo gandharva eva vā /
GP12visnup_u:9137: kimasmākaṃ vicāreṇa bāndhavo 'si namostu te // ViP_5,13.8 //
GP12visnup_u:9140: ity evam uktas tair gopaiḥ kṛṣṇo 'py āha mahāmatiḥ // ViP_5,13.9 //
GP12visnup_u:9142: matsaṃbandhena vo gopā yadi lajjā na jāyate /
GP12visnup_u:9143: ślāghyo vāhaṃ tataḥ kiṃ vo vicāreṇa prayojanam // ViP_5,13.10 //
GP12visnup_u:9144: yadi vo 'sti mayi prītiḥ ślāghyo 'haṃ bhavatāṃ yadi /
GP12visnup_u:9146: nāhaṃ devo na gāndharvo na yakṣo na ca dānavaḥ /
GP12visnup_u:9147: ahaṃ vo bāndhavo jāto naitaccintyamito 'nyathā // ViP_5,13.12 //
GP12visnup_u:9154: vilokya saha gopībhir manaścakre ratiṃ prati // ViP_5,13.15 //
GP12visnup_u:9159: śanaiḥ śanair jagau gopī kācittasya layānugam /
GP12visnup_u:9175: anyā bravīnti kṛṣṇasya mama gītirniśamyatām // ViP_5,13.26 //
GP12visnup_u:9178: anyā bravīti bho gopā niḥśaṅkaiḥ sthīyatāmiti /
GP12visnup_u:9179: alaṃ vṛṣṭibhayenātra dhṛto govardhano mayā // ViP_5,13.28 //
GP12visnup_u:9183: gopyo vyagrāḥsamaṃ cerū ramyaṃ vṛndāvanāntaram // ViP_5,13.30 //
GP12visnup_u:9193: anyajanmani sarvātmā viṣṇur abhyarcitas tayā // ViP_5,13.35 //
GP12visnup_u:9197: yā gantavye drutaṃ yāti nimnapādāgrasaṃsthitiḥ // ViP_5,13.37 //
GP12visnup_u:9203: tena kṛṣṇena yenaiṣā tvaritā padapaddhatiḥ // ViP_5,13.40 //
GP12visnup_u:9204: praviṣṭo gahanaṃ kṛṣṇaḥ padamatra na lakṣyate /
GP12visnup_u:9215: tasyaiva rūpaṃ dhyāyantī yogārūḍheva sā babhau // ViP_5,13.46 //
GP12visnup_u:9229: dadau bāhulatāṃ skandhe gopī madhunighātinaḥ // ViP_5,13.53 //
GP12visnup_u:9235: sādhu kṛṣṇeti kṛṣṇeti tāvattā dviguṇaṃ jaguḥ // ViP_5,13.56 //
GP12visnup_u:9238: sa tathā saha gopībhī rarāsa madhurūdanaḥ /
GP12visnup_u:9240: tā vāryamāṇāḥ patibhiḥ pitṛbhir bhrātṛbhis tathā /
GP12visnup_u:9241: kṛṣṇaṃ gopāṅganā rātrau ramayanti ratipriyāḥ // ViP_5,13.59 //
GP12visnup_u:9264: siṃhanādaṃ tataś cakre talaśabdaṃ ca keśavaḥ /
GP12visnup_u:9276: tuṣṭuvur nihate tasmin daitye gopā janārdanam /
GP12visnup_u:9277: jaṃbhe hate sahasrākṣaṃ purā devagaṇā yathā // ViP_5,14.14 //
GP12visnup_u:9282: pralaṃbe nidhanaṃ nīte dhṛte govardhanācale // ViP_5,15.1 //
GP12visnup_u:9284: hatāyāṃ pūtanāyāṃ ca śakaṭe parivartite // ViP_5,15.2 //
GP12visnup_u:9288: vasudevaṃ prati tadā kopaṃ cakre sudurmatiḥ // ViP_5,15.4 //
GP12visnup_u:9296: tathā tathā yatiṣyāmi yāsyete saṃkṣayaṃ yathā // ViP_5,15.8 //
GP12visnup_u:9305: hantuṃ kṛtam artivīrāv akrūraṃ vākyam avṛbravīt // ViP_5,15.12 //
GP12visnup_u:9307: bho bho dānapate vākyaṃ kriyatāṃ prītaye mama /
GP12visnup_u:9310: nāśāya kila saṃbhūtau mama duṣṭau pravardhataḥ // ViP_5,15.14 //
GP12visnup_u:9312: āneyau bhavatā gatvā mallayuddhāya tatra tau // ViP_5,15.15 //
GP12visnup_u:9316: sa vā haniṣyate pāpau vasudevātmajau śiśu // ViP_5,15.17 //
GP12visnup_u:9317: tau hatvā vasudevaṃ ca nandagopaṃ ca durmatim /
GP12visnup_u:9324: prasādhiṣye tvayā tasmānmatprītyai vīra gamyatām // ViP_5,15.21 //
GP12visnup_u:9326: gopāḥsamānayantvāśu tathā vācyāstvayā ca te // ViP_5,15.22 //
GP12visnup_u:9331: niścakrāma tataḥ puryā mathurāyā madhupriyaḥ // ViP_5,15.24 //
GP12visnup_u:9340: gopyaś ca bhayasaṃvignā govindaṃ śaraṇaṃ yayuḥ // ViP_5,16.3 //
GP12visnup_u:9343: alaṃ trāsena gopālāḥ keśinaḥ kiṃ bhayāturaiḥ /
GP12visnup_u:9344: bhavidbhir gopajātī yair vīravīryaṃ vilopyate // ViP_5,16.5 //
GP12visnup_u:9350: vivṛtāsyaś ca so 'py enaṃ daiteyāśva upādravat // ViP_5,16.8 //
GP12visnup_u:9354: śātitā daśanāḥ petuḥ sitābbrāvayavā iva // ViP_5,16.10 //
GP12visnup_u:9358: sokṣiṇī vivṛte cakre viśiṣṭe muktabandhane // ViP_5,16.12 //
GP12visnup_u:9362: nipātito dvidhā bhūmau vaidyutena yathā drumaḥ // ViP_5,16.14 //
GP12visnup_u:9364: keśinaste dvidhā bhūte śakale dve virejatuḥ // ViP_5,16.15 //
GP12visnup_u:9365: hatvā tu keśinaṃ kṛṣṇo gopālair muditair vṛtaḥ /
GP12visnup_u:9367: tato gopyaś ca gopāś ca hate keśini vismitāḥ /
GP12visnup_u:9376: yāni tair vismitaṃ cetastoṣametena me gatam // ViP_5,16.21 //
GP12visnup_u:9377: turaṅgasyāsya śakropi kṛṣṇa devāś ca bibhyati /
GP12visnup_u:9380: tasmātkeśavanāmnā tvaṃ loke khyāto bhaviṣyasi // ViP_5,16.23 //
GP12visnup_u:9388: tvayaiva viditaṃ sarvaṃ svasti te 'stu vrajāmyaham // ViP_5,16.27 //
GP12visnup_u:9389: nārade tu gate kṛṣṇaḥ saha gopaiḥ sabhājitaḥ /
GP12visnup_u:9397: yo 'ham aṃśāvatīrṇasya mukhaṃ drakṣyāmi cakriṇaḥ // ViP_5,17.2 //
GP12visnup_u:9403: drakṣyāmi tatparaṃ dhāma dhāmrāṃ bhagavato mukham // ViP_5,17.5 //
GP12visnup_u:9409: yasya svarūpaṃ jānanti pratyakṣaṃ yāti me hariḥ // ViP_5,17.8 //
GP12visnup_u:9411: yohya'cintyo 'vyayo vyāpī sa vakṣyati mayā saha // ViP_5,17.9 //
GP12visnup_u:9413: cakāra jagato yo 'jaḥ jagato yo 'jaḥ so 'dya māṃ pralapiṣyati // ViP_5,17.10 //
GP12visnup_u:9417: so 'vatīrṇo jagatyarthe māma krūreti vakṣyati // ViP_5,17.12 //
GP12visnup_u:9423: vedāntavedibhir viṣṇuḥ procyate yo natosmi tam // ViP_5,17.15 //
GP12visnup_u:9425: sadasattena satyena mayyasau yātu saumyātām // ViP_5,17.16 //
GP12visnup_u:9427: puruṣastamajaṃ nityaṃ vrajāmi śaraṇaṃ harim // ViP_5,17.17 //
GP12visnup_u:9430: akrūro gokulaṃ prāptaḥ kiñcitsūrye virājati // ViP_5,17.18 //
GP12visnup_u:9440: tasyānu balabhadraṃ ca dadarśa yadunandanam // ViP_5,17.23 //
GP12visnup_u:9449: apyeṣa pṛṣṭhe mama hastapadmaṃ kariṣyati śrīmadanantamūrtiḥ /

GP12visnup_u:10606: vibhajya pradadau kṛṣṇo bāndhavānāṃ mahāmatiḥ // ViP_5,31.14 //

GP12visnup_u:10608: tataḥ kāle śubhe prāpte upayeme janārdanaḥ /

GP12visnup_u:10627: vṛkādyāś ca sutā mādryāṃ gātravatpramukhān sutān /

GP12visnup_u:10641: mahatkautūhalaṃ jātaṃ kathāṃ śrotumimāṃ hareḥ // ViP_5,32.10 //
GP12visnup_u:10643: uṣā bāṇasutā vipra pārvatīṃ saha śaṃbhunā /

GP12visnup_u:10656: kva gatesīti nirlajjā maitreyoktavatī sakhim // ViP_5,32.16 //
GP12visnup_u:10657: bāṇasya mantrī kuṃbhāṇḍaṃ citrarekhā ca tatsutā /

GP12visnup_u:10659: yadā lajjākulā nāsyai kathayāmāsa sā sakhī /

GP12visnup_u:10664: durvijñeyamidaṃ vaktuṃ prāptuṃ vāpi na sakyate /

GP12visnup_u:10672: manuṣyeṣu dadau dṛṣṭiṃ teṣv apy andhakavṛṣṇiṣu // ViP_5,32.23 //
GP12visnup_u:10680: ayaṃ kṛṣṇasya pautraste bhartā devyā prasāditaḥ /

GP12visnup_u:10683: duṣpraveśā purī pūrvaṃ dvārakā kṛṣṇapālitā // ViP_5,32.28 //
GP12visnup_u:10687: yayau dvāravatīṃ coṣāṃ samāśvāsya tataḥ sakhīm // ViP_5,32.30 //
GP12visnup_u:10694: bhaviṣyati vinā yuddhaṃ bhārāya mama kiṃ bhujaiḥ // ViP_5,33.2 //
GP12visnup_u:10697: piśitāśijanānandaṃ prapsyase tvaṃ tadā raṇam // ViP_5,33.3 //
GP12visnup_u:10700: sabhagnaṃ dhvajamālokya hṛṣṭo harṣaṃ punaryayau // ViP_5,33.4 //
GP12visnup_u:10705: vyādiṣṭaṃ kiṅkarāṇāṃ tu sainyaṃ tena mahātmanā /
GP12visnup_u:10709: māyayā yuyudhe tena sa tadā mantricoditaḥ /
GP12visnup_u:10712: yadūnāmācacakṣe taṃ baddhaṃ bāṇena nāradaḥ // ViP_5,33.10 //
GP12visnup_u:10714: yoṣitā pratyayaṃ jagmuryādavā nāmarair iti // ViP_5,33.11 //
GP12visnup_u:10718: yayau bāṇapurābhyāśaṃ nītvā tānsaṃkṣayaṃ hariḥ // ViP_5,33.13 //
GP12visnup_u:10726: taṃ vīkṣya kṣamyatāmasyetyāha devaḥ pitāmahaḥ // ViP_5,33.17 //
GP12visnup_u:10727: tataś ca kṣāntameveti proktvā taṃ vaiṣṇavaṃ jvaram /
GP12visnup_u:10730: mama tvāya samaṃ yuddhaṃ ye smarīṣyanti mānavāḥ /
GP12visnup_u:10731: vijvarāste bhaviṣyantī tyuktvā cainaṃ yayau jvaraḥ // ViP_5,33.19 //
GP12visnup_u:10735: yuyudhe śaṅkaraścaiva kārttikeyaś ca śauriṇā // ViP_5,33.21 //
GP12visnup_u:10741: tataḥ praṇemurdaiteyāḥ pramathāś ca samantataḥ // ViP_5,33.24 //
GP12visnup_u:10743: na śaśāka tato yoddhuṃ kṛṣṇenākliṣṭakarmaṇā // ViP_5,33.25 //
GP12visnup_u:10746: jṛṃbhite śaṅkare naṣṭe daityasainye guhe jite /
GP12visnup_u:10747: nīte pramathasainye ca saṃkṣayaṃ śārṅgadhanvanā // ViP_5,33.27 //
GP12visnup_u:10753: balaṃ balena dadṛśe bāṇo bāṇaiś ca cakriṇā // ViP_5,33.30 //
GP12visnup_u:10757: vivyādha keśavaṃ bāṇo bāṇaṃ vivyādha cakradhṛk // ViP_5,33.32 //
GP12visnup_u:10761: prācuryeṇa tato bāṇaṃ hantuṃ cakre harirmanaḥ // ViP_5,33.34 //
GP12visnup_u:10767: mumoca bāṇamuddiśya cchettuṃ bāhuvanaṃ ripoḥ // ViP_5,33.37 //
GP12visnup_u:10780: tattvāya nānṛtaṃ kāryaṃ yanmayā vyāhṛtaṃ vacaḥ // ViP_5,33.43 //
GP12visnup_u:10794: vadanti bhedaṃ paśyanti cāvayorantaraṃ hara // ViP_5,33.49 //
GP12visnup_u:10795: prasanno 'haṃ gamiṣyāmi tvaṃ gaccha vṛṣabhadhvaja // ViP_5,33.50 //
GP12visnup_u:10807: jigāya śakraṃ śarvaṃ ca sarvāndevāṃś ca līlayā // ViP_5,34.1 //
GP12visnup_u:10809: tatkathyatāṃ mahābhāga paraṃ kautūhalaṃ hi me // ViP_5,34.2 //
GP12visnup_u:10812: narāvatāre kṛṣṇena dagdhā vārāṇasī yathā // ViP_5,34.3 //
GP12visnup_u:10818: tyaktvā cakrādikaṃ cihnaṃ madīyaṃ nāma cātmanaḥ // ViP_5,34.6 //
GP12visnup_u:10820: ātmano jīvitārthāya tato me praṇati vraja // ViP_5,34.7 //
GP12visnup_u:10822: nijacihnamahaṃ cakraṃ samutsṛkṣye tvayīti vai // ViP_5,34.8 //
GP12visnup_u:10823: vācyaś ca paiṇḍrako gatvā tvayā dūta vaco mama /
GP12visnup_u:10829: śaraṇaṃ te samabhyetya kartāsmi nṛpate tathā /
GP12visnup_u:10830: yathā tvatto bhayaṃ bhūyo na me kiñcid bhaviṣyati // ViP_5,34.12 //
GP12visnup_u:10841: vakṣasthale kṛtaṃ cāsya śrīvatsaṃ dadṛśe hariḥ // ViP_5,34.17 //
GP12visnup_u:10843: taṃ dṛṣṭvā bhāvagaṃbhīraṃ jahāsa garuḍadhvajaḥ // ViP_5,34.18 //
GP12visnup_u:10857: pātito gadayā bhagno dhvajaścāsya garutmatā // ViP_5,34.24 //
GP12visnup_u:10860: tataḥ śārṅgadhanurmuktaiś chittvā tasya śiraḥ śaraiḥ /
GP12visnup_u:10861: kāśīpuryāṃ sa cikṣepa kurvaṃllokasya vismayam // ViP_5,34.26 //
GP12visnup_u:10862: hatvā ta pauḍrakaṃ śauri kāśīrājaṃ ca sānugam /
GP12visnup_u:10863: punardvāravatīṃ prāpto reme svargagato yatā // ViP_5,34.27 //
GP12visnup_u:10865: janaḥ kimetadityāha cchinnaṃ keneti vismitaḥ // ViP_5,34.28 //
GP12visnup_u:10866: jñātvā taṃ vāsudevena hataṃ tasya sutastataḥ /
GP12visnup_u:10869: varaṃ vṛṇīṣveti tadā taṃ provāca nṛpātmajam // ViP_5,34.30 //
GP12visnup_u:10876: kṛṣṇakṛṣṇeti kupitā kṛtyā dvāravarīṃ yayau // ViP_5,34.33 //
GP12visnup_u:10878: yayau śaraṇyaṃ jagatāṃ śaraṇaṃ madhusūdanam // ViP_5,34.34 //
GP12visnup_u:10889: tataḥ kāśībalaṃ bhūri pramathānāṃ tathā balam /
GP12visnup_u:10892: kṛtyā garbhamaśeṣāṃ tāṃ tadā vārāṇasīṃpurīm // ViP_5,34.41 //
GP12visnup_u:10894: aśeṣagoṣṭhakośāṃ tāṃ durnirikṣyāṃ surair api // ViP_5,34.42 //
GP12visnup_u:10896: dadāha taddhareścakraṃ sakalāmeva tāṃ purīm // ViP_5,34.43 //
GP12visnup_u:10914: maitreya cakruḥ kṛṣṇaś ca tānnihantuṃ mahodyamam // ViP_5,35.6 //
GP12visnup_u:10916: mokṣyanti te madvacanādyāsyāmyeko hi kauravān // ViP_5,35.7 //
GP12visnup_u:10926: ūcuś ca kupitāḥsarve bāhlikādyāś ca kauravāḥ /

GP12visnup_u:10931: tadalaṃ pāṇḍuraiś chatrair nṛpayogyair viḍaṃbanaiḥ // ViP_5,35.14 //
GP12visnup_u:10932: tadgaccha bala mā vā tvaṃ sāṃbamanyāyaceṣṭitam /
GP12visnup_u:10935: na nāma sā kṛtā keyamājñā svāmini bhṛtyataḥ // ViP_5,35.16 //
GP12visnup_u:10937: ko doṣo bhavatāṃ nītiryatprītyā nāvalokitā // ViP_5,35.17 //
GP12visnup_u:10938: asmābhir argho bhavato yoyaṃ bala niveditaḥ /
GP12visnup_u:10941: ityuktvā kuravaḥ sāṃbaṃ muñcāmo na hareḥsutam /
GP12visnup_u:10944: utthāya pārṣṇyā vasudhāṃ jaghāna sa halāyudhaḥ // ViP_5,35.20 //
GP12visnup_u:10946: āsphoṭayāmāsa tadā diśaḥ śabdena pūrayan // ViP_5,35.21 //
GP12visnup_u:10954: bibharti yasya bhatyānāṃ so 'pyeṣāṃ na mahīpatiḥ // ViP_5,35.25 //
GP12visnup_u:10956: adya niṣkauravāmurvī kṛtvā yāsyāmi tatpurīm // ViP_5,35.26 //
GP12visnup_u:10961: vīramādāya taṃ sāṃbaṃ sapatnīkaṃ tataḥ purīm /

GP12visnup_u:10968: āghūrṇitaṃ tatsahasā tato vai hāstinaṃ puram /
GP12visnup_u:10978: kṣāntameva mayetyāha balo balavatāṃ varaḥ // ViP_5,35.36 //
GP12visnup_u:10981: tatastu kauravāḥsāṃbaṃ saṃpūjya bali nā saha /
GP12visnup_u:10995: bibheda sādhumaryādāṃ kṣayaṃ cakre ca dehinām // ViP_5,36.5 //
GP12visnup_u:11007: revatī ca mahābhāgā tathaivānyā varastriyaḥ // ViP_5,36.11 //
GP12visnup_u:11009: reme yadukulaśreṣṭhaḥ kubera iva nandane // ViP_5,36.12 //
GP12visnup_u:11011: musalaṃ ca cakārāsya saṃmukhaṃ ca viḍaṃbanam // ViP_5,36.13 //
GP12visnup_u:11013: pānapūrmāś ca karakāñcikṣepāhatya vai tadā // ViP_5,36.14 //

GP12visnup_u:11029: jagannirākṛtaṃ vīra diṣṭyā sa kṣayamāgataḥ // ViP_5,36.22 //

GP12visnup_u:11044: sāṃśo viṣṇumayaṃ sthānaṃ praviveśa mune nijam // ViP_5,37.4 //
GP12visnup_u:11052: sāṃbaṃ jāṃbavatīputraṃ bhūṣayitvā striyaṃ yathā // ViP_5,37.7 //
GP12visnup_u:11054: iyaṃ strī putrakāmā vai brūta kiṃ janayiṣyati // ViP_5,37.8 //
GP12visnup_u:11061: ugrasenāya musalaṃ jajñe sāṃbasya codarāt // ViP_5,37.11 //
GP12visnup_u:11063: jajñe taderakāyūrṇaṃ prakṣiptaṃ tair mahodadhau // ViP_5,37.12 //
GP12visnup_u:11065: khaṇḍaṃ cūrṇitaśeṣaṃ tu tato yattomarākṛti // ViP_5,37.13 //
GP12visnup_u:11070: devaiś ca prahito vāyuḥ praṇipattyāha keśavam /

GP12visnup_u:11077: tvayā manāthāstridaśā bhavantu tridive sadā // ViP_5,37.19 //
GP12visnup_u:11079: idānīṃ gamyatāṃ svargo bhavatā yadi rocate // ViP_5,37.20 //
GP12visnup_u:11083: yattvamātthākhilaṃ dūta vedmy etad aham apy uta /
GP12visnup_u:11084: prārabdha eva hi mayā yādavānāṃparikṣayaḥ // ViP_5,37.22 //
GP12visnup_u:11090: prāpta evāsmi mantavyo devendreṇa tathāmaraiḥ // ViP_5,37.25 //
GP12visnup_u:11097: maitreya divyayā gatyā devarājāntikaṃ yayau // ViP_5,37.28 //
GP12visnup_u:11101: mahotpātāñchamāyaiṣāṃ prabhāsaṃ yāma mā ciram // ViP_5,37.30 //
GP12visnup_u:11113: ahaṃ svargaṃ gamiṣyāmi hyupasaṃhṛtya vaikulam // ViP_5,37.35 //
GP12visnup_u:11114: dvārakāṃ ca mayā tyaktāṃ samudraḥ plāvayiṣyati /
GP12visnup_u:11127: svaṃsvaṃ vai bhuñjatāṃ teṣāṃ kalahaḥ kiṃnimittakaḥ /
GP12visnup_u:11130: mṛṣṭaṃ madīyamannaṃ te na mṛṣṭamiti jalpatām /
GP12visnup_u:11133: jaghnuḥ parasparaṃ te tu śastrair daivabalātkṛtāḥ // ViP_5,37.43 //
GP12visnup_u:11135: erakā tu gṛhītā vai vajrabhūteva lakṣyate /
GP12visnup_u:11140: erakārūpibhir vajrais te nijaghnuḥ parasparam // ViP_5,37.47 //
GP12visnup_u:11142: sahāyaṃ menirerīṇāṃ prāptaṃ jaghnuḥ parasparam // ViP_5,37.48 //
GP12visnup_u:11148: paśyato dārukasyātha prāyādaśvair dhṛto dvija // ViP_5,37.51 //
GP12visnup_u:11149: cakraṃ gadā tathā śārṅga tūṇīśaṅkhosireva ca /
GP12visnup_u:11152: ṛte kṛṣṇaṃ mahātmānaṃ dārukaṃ ca mahāmune // ViP_5,37.53 //
GP12visnup_u:11159: dṛṣṭvā balasya niryāṇaṃ dārukaṃ prāha keśavaḥ /
GP12visnup_u:11163: vācyaś ca dvārakāvāsī janaḥ sarvas tathāhukaḥ /
GP12visnup_u:11164: yathomāṃ nagarīṃ sarvāṃ samudraḥ plāvayiṣyati // ViP_5,37.59 //
GP12visnup_u:11166: na stheyaṃ dvārakāmadhye niṣkrānte tatra pāṇḍave // ViP_5,37.60 //
GP12visnup_u:11167: tenaiva saha gantavyāṃ yatra yāti sa kauravaḥ // ViP_5,37.61 //
GP12visnup_u:11171: gṛhītvā yādi vajraś ca yadurājo bhaviṣyati // ViP_5,37.63 //
GP12visnup_u:11173: ityukto dārukaḥ kṛṣṇaṃ praṇipatya punaḥ punaḥ /
GP12visnup_u:11174: pradakṣiṇaṃ ca bahuśaḥ kṛtvā prāyādyathoditam // ViP_5,37.64 //
GP12visnup_u:11175: sa ca gatvā tadācaṣṭa dvārakāyāṃ tathār'junam /
GP12visnup_u:11176: ānināya mahābuddhirvajraṃ cakre tathā nṛpam // ViP_5,37.65 //
GP12visnup_u:11183: āyayau sa jarānāma tadā tatra sa lubdhakaḥ /
GP12visnup_u:11186: tale vivyādha tenaiva tomareṇa dvijottama // ViP_5,37.69 //
GP12visnup_u:11187: tataś ca dadṛśe tatra cadurbāhudharaṃ naram /
GP12visnup_u:11188: praṇipatyāha caivainaṃ prasīdeti punaḥ punaḥ // ViP_5,37.70 //
GP12visnup_u:11190: kṣamyatāṃ mama pāpena dagdhaṃ māṃ trātumarhasi // ViP_5,37.71 //
GP12visnup_u:11193: gaccha tvaṃ matprasādena lubdha svargaṃ surāspadam // ViP_5,37.72 //
GP12visnup_u:11200: tatyāja mānuṣaṃ dehamatītya trividhāṃ gatim // ViP_5,37.75 //
GP12visnup_u:11213: niścakrāma janaṃ sarve gṛhītvā vajrameva ca // ViP_5,38.5 //
GP12visnup_u:11215: vajraṃ janaṃ ca kauteyaḥ pālayañchanakair yayau // ViP_5,38.6 //
GP12visnup_u:11217: svargaṃ jagāma maitreya pārijātaś ca pādapaḥ // ViP_5,38.7 //
GP12visnup_u:11220: plāvayāmāsa tāṃ śūnyāṃ dvārakāṃ ca mahodadhiḥ /
GP12visnup_u:11221: vāsudevagṛhaṃ tvekaṃ na plāvayati sāgaraḥ // ViP_5,38.9 //
GP12visnup_u:11227: cakāra vāsaṃ sarvasya janasya munisattamaḥ // ViP_5,38.12 //
GP12visnup_u:11235: karṇādīṃś ca na jānāti balaṃ grāmanivāsinām // ViP_5,38.16 //
GP12visnup_u:11237: sarvānevāvajānāti kiṃ vo bāhubhir unnataiḥ // ViP_5,38.17 //
GP12visnup_u:11241: nivartadhvamadharmajñā yadi na stha mumūrṣavaḥ // ViP_5,38.19 //
GP12visnup_u:11243: strīdhanaṃ caiva maitreya viṣvaksena piragraham // ViP_5,38.20 //
GP12visnup_u:11245: āropayitumārebhe na śaśāka ca vīryavān // ViP_5,38.21 //
GP12visnup_u:11247: na sasmāra tatostrāṇi cintayannapi pāṇḍavaḥ // ViP_5,38.22 //
GP12visnup_u:11249: tvagbhedaṃ de paraṃ cakrurastā gāṇḍīvadhanvinā // ViP_5,38.23 //
GP12visnup_u:11250: vahninā ye 'kṣayā dattāḥ śarāstepi kṣayaṃ yayuḥ /
GP12visnup_u:11253: yanmayā śarasaṃghātaiḥ sakalā bhūbhṛto hatāḥ // ViP_5,38.25 //
GP12visnup_u:11255: ābhīrair apakṛṣyanta kāmaṃ cānyāḥ pradudruvuḥ // ViP_5,38.26 //
GP12visnup_u:11259: jagmurādāya te mlecchāḥ samastā munisattama // ViP_5,38.28 //
GP12visnup_u:11261: aho bhagavatānena muṣṭosmīti ruroda vai // ViP_5,38.29 //
GP12visnup_u:11262: taddhanustāni śastrāṇi sa rathaste ca vājinaḥ /
GP12visnup_u:11266: tau bāhū sa ca me muṣṭiḥ sthānaṃ tatsosmi cārjunaḥ /
GP12visnup_u:11267: puṇyenaiva vinā tena gataṃ sarvamasāratām // ViP_5,38.32 //
GP12visnup_u:11269: vinā tena yadā bhīrair jitohaṃ rathināṃ varaḥ // ViP_5,38.33 //
GP12visnup_u:11272: cakāra tatra rājānaṃ vajraṃ yādavanandanam // ViP_5,38.34 //
GP12visnup_u:11273: sa dadarśa tato vyāsaṃ phālgunaḥ kānanāśrayam /
GP12visnup_u:11276: uvāca vākyaṃ vicchāyaḥ kathamadya tvamīdṛśaḥ // ViP_5,38.36 //
GP12visnup_u:11282: kiṃ vā kṛpaṇavittāni hṛtāni bhavatār'juna // ViP_5,38.39 //
GP12visnup_u:11286: kena tvaṃ vāsi vicchāyo nyūnair vā yudhi nījātaḥ // ViP_5,38.41 //
GP12visnup_u:11291: yadbalaṃ yacca mattejo yadvīryaṃ yaḥ parākramaḥ /
GP12visnup_u:11292: yā śrīśchāyā ca naḥ sosmānparityajya harirgataḥ // ViP_5,38.43 //
GP12visnup_u:11294: hīnā vayaṃ mune tena jātāstṛṇamayā iva // ViP_5,38.44 //
GP12visnup_u:11295: astrāṇāṃ sāyakānāṃ ca gāṇḍīvasya tathā mama /
GP12visnup_u:11302: vibhāti tāta naikohaṃ virahe tasya cakriṇaḥ // ViP_5,38.48 //
GP12visnup_u:11304: vinā tenādya kṛṣṇena gopālaurasmi nirjitaḥ // ViP_5,38.49 //
GP12visnup_u:11308: yatato mama nītāni dasyubhir laguḍāyudhaiḥ // ViP_5,38.51 //
GP12visnup_u:11310: hṛtaṃ yaṣṭipraharaṇaiḥ paribhūya balaṃ mama // ViP_5,38.52 //
GP12visnup_u:11311: niḥśrīkatā na me citraṃ yajjīvāmi tadadbhutam /
GP12visnup_u:11314: alaṃ te vrīḍayā pārtha na tvaṃ śocitum arhasi /
GP12visnup_u:11317: kālamūlam idaṃ jñātvā bhava sthairyaparo 'rjuna // ViP_5,38.55 //
GP12visnup_u:11319: devā manuṣyāḥ paśavastaravaś ca sarīsṛpāḥ // ViP_5,38.56 //
GP12visnup_u:11320: sṛṣṭāḥ kālena kālena punar yāsyanti saṃkṣayam /
GP12visnup_u:11325: bhārākrāntā dharā yātā devānāṃ samitiṃ purā // ViP_5,38.59 //
GP12visnup_u:11327: tacca niṣpādinaṃ kāryamaśeṣā bhūbhujo hatāḥ // ViP_5,38.60 //
GP12visnup_u:11329: na kiñcidanyatkartavyaṃ tasya bhūmitale prabhoḥ // ViP_5,38.61 //
GP12visnup_u:11331: sṛṣṭiṃ sarge karotyeṣa devadevaḥ sthitau sthitim /
GP12visnup_u:11332: antentāya samarthoyaṃ sāṃprataṃ vai yathā gataḥ // ViP_5,38.62 //
GP12visnup_u:11334: bhavanti bhāvāḥ kāleṣu puruṣāṇāṃ yataḥ stutiḥ // ViP_5,38.63 //
GP12visnup_u:11336: teṣāmarjuna kālotthaḥ kiṃ nyūnābhibhavo na saḥ // ViP_5,38.64 //
GP12visnup_u:11338: kṛtastathaiva bhavato dasyubhyaḥ sa parābhavaḥ // ViP_5,38.65 //
GP12visnup_u:11344: ābhīrebhyaś ca bhavataḥ kaḥ śraddadhyātparābhavam // ViP_5,38.68 //
GP12visnup_u:11346: tvayā yatkaurāvā dhvastā yadābhīrair bhavāñjitaḥ // ViP_5,38.69 //
GP12visnup_u:11347: gṛhītā dasyubhir yāś ca bhavāñchocati tāḥstriyaḥ /
GP12visnup_u:11352: babhūva tatra gacchantyo dadṛśustaṃ surastriyaḥ // ViP_5,38.72 //
GP12visnup_u:11354: tuṣṭuvustaṃ mahātmānaṃ praśaśaṃsuś ca pāṇḍava // ViP_5,38.73 //
GP12visnup_u:11358: sarvāstāḥ kauravaśreṣṭha taṃ variṣṭhaṃ dvijanmanām // ViP_5,38.75 //
GP12visnup_u:11365: tadicchāmaḥ patiṃ prāptuṃ viprendra puruṣottama // ViP_5,38.78 //
GP12visnup_u:11369: taṃ dṛṣṭvā gūhamānānāṃ yāsāṃ hāsaḥ sphuṭo 'bhavat /
GP12visnup_u:11370: tāḥ śaśāpa muniḥ kopamavāpya kurunandana // ViP_5,38.80 //
GP12visnup_u:11372: bhavatībhiḥ kṛtā tasmādetaṃ śāpaṃ dadāmi vaḥ // ViP_5,38.81 //
GP12visnup_u:11377: punaḥsuredralokaṃ vai prāha bhūyo gamiṣyatha // ViP_5,38.83 //
GP12visnup_u:11379: bhartāraṃ prāpya tā yātā dasyuhastaṃ surāṅganāḥ // ViP_5,38.84 //
GP12visnup_u:11380: tattvāya nātra kartavyaḥ śoko 'lpopi hi pāṇḍava /
GP12visnup_u:11383: balaṃ lejas tathā vīryaṃ māhātmyaṃ copasaṃhṛtam // ViP_5,38.86 //
GP12visnup_u:11384: jātasya niyato mṛtyuḥ patanaṃ ca tathonnateḥ /
GP12visnup_u:11386: vijñāya na budhāḥ śokaṃ na harṣamupayānti ye /
GP12visnup_u:11389: parityajyākhilaṃ tantraṃ gantavyaṃ tapase vanam // ViP_5,38.89 //
GP12visnup_u:11391: paraśvo bhrātṛbhiḥ sārdha yathā yāsi tathā kuru // ViP_5,38.90 //
GP12visnup_u:11393: dṛṣṭaṃ caivānubhūtaṃ ca sarvamākhyātavāṃs tathā // ViP_5,38.91 //
GP12visnup_u:11395: rājye parīkṣitaṃ kṛtvā yayuḥ pāṇḍusutā vanam // ViP_5,38.92 //
GP12visnup_u:11401: iti śrīviṣṇumahāpurāṇe viṣṇucittyātmaprakāśākhya śrīdharīyavyākhyādvayopete pañca māṃśaḥ samāptaḥ /
GP12visnup_u:11403: atha śrīviṣṇumahāpurāṇe viṣṇucittyātmaprakāśākhyaśrīdharīya vyākhyādvayopete ṣaṣṭhāṃśaḥ prārabhyate /
GP12visnup_u:11409: mahāpralayasaṃjñāṃ ca kalpānte ca mahāmune // ViP_6,1.2 //
GP12visnup_u:11412: kalpānte prākṛte caiva pralayo jāyate yathā // ViP_6,1.3 //
GP12visnup_u:11414: caturyugamahasre tu brahmaṇo vai dvijottama // ViP_6,1.4 //
GP12visnup_u:11415: kṛtaṃ tretā dvāparaṃ ca kaliśceti caturyugam /
GP12visnup_u:11416: divyair varṣasahasrais tu taddvādaśabhir ucyate // ViP_6,1.5 //
GP12visnup_u:11418: ādyaṃ kṛtayugaṃ muktvā maitreyāntyaṃ tathā kalim // ViP_6,1.6 //
GP12visnup_u:11419: ādye kṛtayuge sargo brahmaṇā kriyate yathā /
GP12visnup_u:11420: kriyate copasaṃhārastathāṃ'te ca kalau yuge // ViP_6,1.7 //
GP12visnup_u:11423: dharmaś catuṣpād bhagavān yasmin viplavam ṛcchati // ViP_6,1.8 //
GP12visnup_u:11429: vivāhā na kalau dharmyā na śiṣyagurusaṃsthitiḥ /
GP12visnup_u:11430: na dāṃpatyakramo naiva vahnidevātmakaḥ kramaḥ // ViP_6,1.11 //
GP12visnup_u:11431: yatra kutra kule jāto balī sarveśvaraḥ kalau /
GP12visnup_u:11432: sarvebhya eva varṇebhyo yogyaḥ kanyāvarodhane // ViP_6,1.12 //
GP12visnup_u:11433: yena kena ca yogena dvijātirdīkṣitaḥ kalau /
GP12visnup_u:11434: yaiva saiva ca maitreya prāyaścittaṃ kalau kriyā // ViP_6,1.13 //
GP12visnup_u:11435: sarvameva kalau śāstraṃ yasya yadvajanaṃ dvija /
GP12visnup_u:11436: devatā ca kalau sarvā sarvaḥsarvasya cāśramaḥ // ViP_6,1.14 //
GP12visnup_u:11440: strīṇāṃ rūpamadaścaivaṃ keśair eva bhaviṣyati // ViP_6,1.16 //
GP12visnup_u:11442: kalau striyo bhaviṣyanti tadā keśair alaṅkṛtāḥ // ViP_6,1.17 //
GP12visnup_u:11444: bhartā bhaviṣyati kalau vittavāneva yoṣitām // ViP_6,1.18 //
GP12visnup_u:11445: yo vai dadāti bahulaṃ svaṃ sa svāmī sadā nṛṇām /
GP12visnup_u:11447: gṛhāntā dravysaṃghātā dravyāntā ca tathā matiḥ /
GP12visnup_u:11453: samānapauruṣaṃ ceto bhuvi vipreṣu vai kalau /
GP12visnup_u:11454: kṣīrapradānasaṃbandhi bhāvi goṣu ca gauravam // ViP_6,1.23 //
GP12visnup_u:11462: kariṣyanti kalau prāpte na ca piṇḍodakakriyām // ViP_6,1.27 //
GP12visnup_u:11464: bahuprajālpabhāgyāś ca bhaviṣyanti kalau striyaḥ // ViP_6,1.28 //
GP12visnup_u:11472: gṛhasthāś ca na hoṣyanti na dāsyantyucitānyapi // ViP_6,1.32 //
GP12visnup_u:11476: hāriṇo janavittānāṃ saṃprāpte tu kalau yuge // ViP_6,1.34 //
GP12visnup_u:11478: yaś ca yaścābalaḥ sarvaḥ sa sa bhṛtyaḥ kalau yuge // ViP_6,1.35 //
GP12visnup_u:11485: vedamārge pralīne ca pāṣaṇḍāḍhye tato jane /
GP12visnup_u:11492: nātijīvati vai kaścitkalau varṣāṇi viṃśatiḥ // ViP_6,1.42 //
GP12visnup_u:11502: tadānumeyaṃ prādhānyaṃ kaler maitreya paṇḍitaiḥ // ViP_6,1.47 //
GP12visnup_u:11504: ijyate puruṣair yajñais tadā jñeyaṃ kaler balam // ViP_6,1.48 //
GP12visnup_u:11509: kiṃ devaiḥ kiṃ dvijair vedaiḥ kiṃ śauce nāṃbujanmanā /
GP12visnup_u:11512: phalaṃ tathālpasāraṃ ca vipra prāpte kalau yuge // ViP_6,1.52 //
GP12visnup_u:11514: śūdraprāyās tathā varṇā bhaviṣyanti kalau yuge // ViP_6,1.53 //
GP12visnup_u:11516: bhaviṣyati kalau prāpte hyauśīraṃ cānulepanam // ViP_6,1.54 //
GP12visnup_u:11518: śyālādya hāribhāryāś ca sṛhṛdo munisattama // ViP_6,1.55 //
GP12visnup_u:11519: kasya mātā pitā kasya yathā karmānugaḥ pumān /
GP12visnup_u:11526: tadā praviralo dharmaḥ kvacilloke nivatsyati // ViP_6,1.59 //
GP12visnup_u:11528: karotiyaḥ kṛtayuge kriyate tapasā hi saḥ // ViP_6,1.60 //
GP12visnup_u:11533: tacchrūyatāṃ mahābhāgā gadato mama tattvataḥ // ViP_6,2.1 //
GP12visnup_u:11535: munīnāṃ puṇyavādo 'bhūtkaiś cāsau kriyate sukham // ViP_6,2.2 //
GP12visnup_u:11537: yayuste saṃśayaṃ praṣṭuṃ maitreya munipuṅgavāḥ // ViP_6,2.3 //
GP12visnup_u:11541: tasthus tīre mahānadyās taruṣaṇḍam upāśritāḥ // ViP_6,2.5 //
GP12visnup_u:11544: teṣāṃ munīnāṃ bhūyaś ca mamajja sa nadījale // ViP_6,2.6 //
GP12visnup_u:11545: sādhusādhviti cotthāya śūdra dhanyosi cābravīt // ViP_6,2.7 //
GP12visnup_u:11546: nimagnaś ca samutthāya punaḥ prāha mahāmuniḥ /
GP12visnup_u:11554: alaṃ tenāstu tāvannaḥ kathyatāmaparaṃ tvayā // ViP_6,2.11 //
GP12visnup_u:11556: yadāha bhagavāntsādhu dhanyāśceti punaḥ punāḥ // ViP_6,2.12 //
GP12visnup_u:11557: tat sarvaṃ śrotum icchāmo na ced guhyaṃ mahāmune /
GP12visnup_u:11558: tatkathyatāṃ tato hṛtsthaṃ pṛcchāmastvāṃ prayojanam // ViP_6,2.13 //
GP12visnup_u:11561: śrūyatāṃ bho muniśreṣṭhā yaduktaṃ sādhusādhviti // ViP_6,2.14 //
GP12visnup_u:11563: yatkṛte daśabhir varṣais tretāyāṃ hāyanena tat /
GP12visnup_u:11564: dvāpare tacca māsena hyahorātreṇa tatkalau // ViP_6,2.15 //
GP12visnup_u:11565: tapaso brahmacaryasya japādeś ca phalaṃ dvijāḥ /
GP12visnup_u:11568: yadāpnoti tadāpnoti kalau saṃkīrtya keśavam // ViP_6,2.17 //
GP12visnup_u:11572: tataḥsa dharmasaṃprāptair yaṣṭavyaṃ vidhivad dhanaiḥ // ViP_6,2.19 //
GP12visnup_u:11573: vṛthā kathā vṛthā bhojyaṃ vṛthejyā ca dvijanmanām /
GP12visnup_u:11574: patanāya tato bhāvyaṃ tais tu saṃyamibhiḥ sadā // ViP_6,2.20 //
GP12visnup_u:11577: pāratantryaṃ samasteṣu teṣāṃ kāryeṣu vai yataḥ /
GP12visnup_u:11584: pratipādanīyaṃ pātreṣu yaṣṭavyaṃ ca yathāvidhi // ViP_6,2.25 //
GP12visnup_u:11590: taddhitā śubhamāpnoti tatsālokyaṃ yato dvijāḥ // ViP_6,2.28 //
GP12visnup_u:11592: tṛtīyaṃ vyāhṛtaṃ tena mayā sādhviti yoṣitaḥ // ViP_6,2.29 //
GP12visnup_u:11594: tatpṛcchataḥ yathākāmaṃ sava bakṣyāmi vaḥ sphuṭam // ViP_6,2.30 //
GP12visnup_u:11596: asminneva ca tatpraśne yathāvatkathitaṃ tvayā // ViP_6,2.31 //
GP12visnup_u:11600: mayaiṣa bhavatāṃ praśro jñāto divyena cakṣuṣā /
GP12visnup_u:11601: tatohaṃ vaḥ prasaṃgena sādhusādhviti bhāṣitam // ViP_6,2.33 //
GP12visnup_u:11605: tathā strībhir anāyā sātpatiśuśrūṣayaiva hi // ViP_6,2.35 //
GP12visnup_u:11611: tataḥsaṃpūjya te vyāsaṃ praśaśaṃsuḥ punaḥ punaḥ /
GP12visnup_u:11616: prākṛtāmantarālāṃ ca tāmapyeṣa vadāmi te // ViP_6,2.40 //
GP12visnup_u:11631: tadāvyaktekhilaṃ vyaktaṃ svahetau layameti vai // ViP_6,3.5 //
GP12visnup_u:11633: taiḥ pañcadaśabhiḥ kāṣṭhā triṃśatkāṣṭha kalā smṛtā // ViP_6,3.6 //
GP12visnup_u:11634: nāḍikā tu pramāṇena sā kalā daśa pañca ca // ViP_6,3.7 //
GP12visnup_u:11636: māgadhena tu mānena jalaprasthastu sa smṛtaḥ /
GP12visnup_u:11639: ahorātraṃ muhurtāstu triṃśanmāso dinais tathā // ViP_6,3.9 //
GP12visnup_u:11641: tribhir varṣaśatair varṣaṃ ṣaṣṭyā caivāsuradviṣām // ViP_6,3.10 //
GP12visnup_u:11643: caturyugasahasraṃ tu kathyate brahmaṇo dinam // ViP_6,3.11 //
GP12visnup_u:11645: tadante caiva maitreya brāhmo nemittiko layaḥ // ViP_6,3.12 //
GP12visnup_u:11647: śṛṇuṣva prākṛtaṃ bhūyastava vakṣyāmyahaṃ layam // ViP_6,3.13 //
GP12visnup_u:11654: tataḥ sa bhagavān viṣṇur bhānoḥ saptasu raśmiṣu /
GP12visnup_u:11657: śoṣaṃ nayati maitreya samastaṃ pṛthivītalam // ViP_6,3.18 //
GP12visnup_u:11659: pātāleṣu ca yattoyaṃ tatsarvaṃ nayati kṣayam // ViP_6,3.19 //
GP12visnup_u:11661: ta eva raśmayaḥsapta jāyante sapta bhāskarāḥ // ViP_6,3.20 //
GP12visnup_u:11662: adhaścordhvaṃ ca te dīptā stataḥsapta divākarāḥ /
GP12visnup_u:11664: dahyamānaṃ tu tair dīptais trailokyaṃ dvija bhāskaraiḥ /
GP12visnup_u:11670: pātālāni samastāni sa dagdhvā jvalano mahān /
GP12visnup_u:11679: gañcchanti janalokaṃ te daśāvṛttyā paraiṣiṇaḥ // ViP_6,3.29 //
GP12visnup_u:11685: dhūmravarṇā ghanāḥ kecitkecitpītāḥ payo dharāḥ // ViP_6,3.32 //
GP12visnup_u:11689: indragopanibhāḥ kecit tataḥ śakhinibhās tathā // ViP_6,3.34 //
GP12visnup_u:11697: naṣṭe cāgnau ca satataṃ varṣamāṇā hyaharniśam /
GP12visnup_u:11698: plāvayanti jagat sarvam aṃbhobir munisattama // ViP_6,3.38 //
GP12visnup_u:11700: bhuvarlokaṃ tathevordhū plāvayanti hi te dvija // ViP_6,3.39 //
GP12visnup_u:11702: varṣati te mahāmeghā varṣāṇāmadhikaṃ śatam // ViP_6,3.40 //
GP12visnup_u:11721: nimittaṃ tatra yacchete brahmarūpadharo hariḥ // ViP_6,4.7 //
GP12visnup_u:11722: yadā jāgarti sarvātmā sa tadā ceṣṭate jagat /
GP12visnup_u:11729: naimittikaste kathitaḥ prākṛtaḥ śṛṇvataḥ param // ViP_6,4.11 //
GP12visnup_u:11734: āpo grasaṃti vai pūrvaṃ bhūmergandhātmakaṃ guṇam /
GP12visnup_u:11735: āttagandhā tato bhūmiḥ pralayatvāya kalpate // ViP_6,4.14 //
GP12visnup_u:11740: apāmapi guṇo yastu jyotiṣā pīyate tu saḥ /
GP12visnup_u:11743: agnāvasthe tu salile tejasā sarvato vṛte // ViP_6,4.18 //
GP12visnup_u:11744: sa cāgniḥ sarvato vyāpya cādatte tajjalaṃ tathā /
GP12visnup_u:11747: jyotiṣo 'pi paraṃ rūpaṃ vāyuratti prabhākaram // ViP_6,4.20 //
GP12visnup_u:11751: nirā loke tathā loke vāyvavasthe ca tejasi // ViP_6,4.22 //
GP12visnup_u:11753: ūrdhvaṃ cādhaś ca tiryakca dodhavīti diśo daśa // ViP_6,4.23 //
GP12visnup_u:11755: praśāmyati tato vāyuḥ khaṃ tu tiṣṭhatyanāvṛtam // ViP_6,4.24 //
GP12visnup_u:11760: bhītādiṃ grasate cāpi mahānve buddhilakṣaṇaḥ // ViP_6,4.28 //
GP12visnup_u:11761: urvī mahaṃś ca jagataḥ pratintarbāhyatas tathā // ViP_6,4.29 //
GP12visnup_u:11763: pratyāhāre tu tāḥsarvāḥ praviśanti parasparam // ViP_6,4.30 //
GP12visnup_u:11766: udakāvaraṇaṃ yattu jyotiṣā pīyate tu tam /
GP12visnup_u:11767: jyotirvāyau layaṃ yāti yātyākāśe samīramaḥ // ViP_6,4.32 //
GP12visnup_u:11768: ākāśaṃ caiva bhūtādirgrasate taṃ tathā mahān /
GP12visnup_u:11778: tadbrahma paramaṃ dhāma paramātmā sa ceśvaraḥ /
GP12visnup_u:11779: sa viṣṇuḥsarvamevedaṃ yato nāvartate yatiḥ // ViP_6,4.38 //
GP12visnup_u:11783: viṣṇunāmā sa vedeṣu vedānteṣu ca gīyate // ViP_6,4.40 //
GP12visnup_u:11784: pravṛttaṃ ca nivṛttaṃ ca dvividhaṅkarma vaidikam /
GP12visnup_u:11796: dviparārdhātmakaḥ kālaḥ kathito yo mayā tava /
GP12visnup_u:11798: vyakte ca prakṛtau līne prakṛtyāṃ puruṣe tathā /
GP12visnup_u:11799: tatra sthite niśā cāsya tatpramāṇā mahāmune // ViP_6,4.48 //
GP12visnup_u:11802: ityeṣa tava maitreya kathitaḥ prākṛto layaḥ /
GP12visnup_u:11810: śarīro bahubhir bhedair bhidyate śruyatāṃ ca saḥ // ViP_6,5.2 //
GP12visnup_u:11818: ityevamādibhir bhedais tāpo hyādhyātmikaḥ smṛtaḥ // ViP_6,5.6 //
GP12visnup_u:11820: sarīsṛpādyaiś ca nṛṇāṃ jāyate cādhibhautikaḥ // ViP_6,5.7 //
GP12visnup_u:11824: duḥkhaṃ sahasraśo bhedair bhidyate munisattama // ViP_6,5.9 //
GP12visnup_u:11839: kaṇṭakair iva tunnāṅgaḥ krakacair iva dāritaḥ /
GP12visnup_u:11846: bālabhāve yadā pnoti hyādhibhautādikāni ca // ViP_6,5.20 //
GP12visnup_u:11848: na jānāti kutaḥ kohaṃ kvāhaṃ gantā kimātmanaḥ // ViP_6,5.21 //
GP12visnup_u:11850: kiṃ kāryaṃ kimakāryaṃ vā kiṃ vācyaṃ kiṃ ca nocyate // ViP_6,5.22 //
GP12visnup_u:11851: ko dharmaḥ kaś ca vādharmaḥ kasminvarte 'tha vā katham /
GP12visnup_u:11852: kiṃ kartavyamakartavyaṃ kiṃ vā kiṅguṇadoṣavat // ViP_6,5.23 //
GP12visnup_u:11878: maraṇe yāni duḥkhāni prāpnoti śṛṇutānyapi // ViP_6,5.36 //
GP12visnup_u:11888: tāpena mahatā vyāptastṛṣā cārtas tathā kṣudhā // ViP_6,5.41 //
GP12visnup_u:11890: tataś ca yātanādehaṃ kleśena pratipadyate // ViP_6,5.42 //
GP12visnup_u:11892: śṛṇuṣva narake yāni prāpyante puruṣair mṛtaiḥ // ViP_6,5.43 //
GP12visnup_u:11896: pratyekaṃ narakeyāś ca yātanā dvija duḥsahāḥ // ViP_6,5.45 //
GP12visnup_u:11898: kuṭhāraiḥ kṛtyamānānāṃ bhūmau cāpi nikhanyatām // ViP_6,5.46 //
GP12visnup_u:11904: prāpyante nārakair vipra teṣāṃ saṃkhyā na vidyate // ViP_6,5.49 //
GP12visnup_u:11907: punaś ca garbhe bhavati jāyate ca punaḥ punaḥ /
GP12visnup_u:11908: garbhe vilīyate bhūyo jāyamāno 'stameti vai // ViP_6,5.51 //
GP12visnup_u:11910: madhyamaṃ vā vayaḥ prāpya vārdhake vātha vā mṛtiḥ // ViP_6,5.52 //
GP12visnup_u:11912: taṃ tu kāraṇapakṣmaughair āste kārpāsabījavat // ViP_6,5.53 //
GP12visnup_u:11913: dravyanāśe tathotpattau pālane ca sadā nṛṇām /
GP12visnup_u:11918: kriyate na tathā bhūri sukhaṃ puṃsāṃ yathā sukham // ViP_6,5.56 //
GP12visnup_u:11925: tasmāt tatprāptaye yatnaḥ kartavyaḥ paṇḍitair naraiḥ /
GP12visnup_u:11926: tatprāptiheturjñānaṃ ca karma coktaṃ mahāmune // ViP_6,5.60 //
GP12visnup_u:11927: āgamotthaṃ vivekācca dvidhā jñānaṃ tad ucyate /
GP12visnup_u:11930: yathā sūryas tathā jñānaṃ yadviprarṣe vivekajam // ViP_6,5.62 //
GP12visnup_u:11933: dve brahmaṇī veditavye śabdabrahma paraṃ ca yat /
GP12visnup_u:11935: dve vai vidye veditavye iti cātharvaṇī śrutiḥ /
GP12visnup_u:11937: yat tad avyaktam ajaram acintyam ajam avyayam /
GP12visnup_u:11940: vyāpya vyāptaṃ yataḥ sarvaṃ yad vai paśyanti sūrayaḥ // ViP_6,5.67 //
GP12visnup_u:11941: tadbrahma tatparaṃ dhāma tad dhyeyaṃ mokṣakāṃkṣibhiḥ /
GP12visnup_u:11942: śrutivākyoditaṃ sūkṣmaṃ tadviṣṇoḥ paramaṃ padam // ViP_6,5.68 //
GP12visnup_u:11952: netā gamayatā sraṣṭā gakārārthas tathā mune // ViP_6,5.73 //
GP12visnup_u:11960: śabdo 'yaṃ nopacāreṇa tvanyatra hy upacārataḥ // ViP_6,5.77 //
GP12visnup_u:11962: vetti vidyāmāvidyāṃ ca sa vācyo bhagavāniti // ViP_6,5.78 //
GP12visnup_u:11966: bhūteṣu ca sa sarvātmā vāsudevastataḥ smṛtaḥ // ViP_6,5.80 //
GP12visnup_u:11969: bhūteṣu vasate soṃ'tarvasaṃtyatra ca tāni yat /
GP12visnup_u:11970: dhātā vidhātā jagatāṃ vāsudevastataḥ prabhuḥ // ViP_6,5.82 //
GP12visnup_u:11971: sa sarvabhūtaprakṛtiṃ vikārānguṇādidośāṃś ca mune vyatītaḥ /
GP12visnup_u:11976: paraḥ parāṇāṃ sakalā na yatra kleśādayaḥsaṃti parāvareśe // ViP_6,5.85 //
GP12visnup_u:11979: saṃjñāyate yena tadastadoṣaṃ śuddhaṃ paraṃ nirmalamekarūpam /
GP12visnup_u:11985: tatprāptikāraṇaṃ brahma tad etad iti paṭhyate // ViP_6,6.1 //
GP12visnup_u:11989: na māṃ sa cakṣuṣā draṣṭuṃ brahmabhūtaḥsa śakyate // ViP_6,6.3 //
GP12visnup_u:11995: najakāya purā yoga tamahaṃ kathayāmi te // ViP_6,6.5 //
GP12visnup_u:11998: kathaṃ tayoś ca saṃvādo yogasaṃbandhakāraṇāt // ViP_6,6.6 //
GP12visnup_u:12013: gharmadhenuṃ jaghānograḥ śārdulo vijane vane // ViP_6,6.13 //
GP12visnup_u:12014: tato rājā hatāṃ śrutvā dhanuṃ vyāghreṇa cartvijaḥ /
GP12visnup_u:12015: prāyaścitaṃ sa papraccha kimatreti vidhīyatām // ViP_6,6.14 //
GP12visnup_u:12018: śunakaṃ pṛccha rājaindra nāhaṃ vedmi sa vetsyati /
GP12visnup_u:12019: sa gatvā kamapṛcchacca so 'py āha śṛṇu yanmune // ViP_6,6.16 //
GP12visnup_u:12020: na keśarurna caivāhaṃ na caikaḥsāṃprataṃ bhuvi /
GP12visnup_u:12021: vettyeka eva tvacchatruḥ khāṇḍikyo yo jitastvayā // ViP_6,6.17 //
GP12visnup_u:12022: sa cāha taṃ vrajāmyeṣa praṣṭumātmarīpuṃ mune /
GP12visnup_u:12023: prāpta eva mahāyajño yadi māṃ sa haniṣyati // ViP_6,6.18 //
GP12visnup_u:12028: vanaṃ jagāma yatrāste sa khāṇḍikyo mahāmatiḥ // ViP_6,6.20 //
GP12visnup_u:12033: kṛṣṇājinadhare vetsi na mayi prahariṣyati // ViP_6,6.22 //
GP12visnup_u:12034: mṛgāṇāṃ vada pṛṣṭheṣu mūḍha kṛṣṇājinaṃ na kim /
GP12visnup_u:12035: yeṣāṃ mayā tvāya cogrāḥ prahitāḥ śitasāyakāḥ // ViP_6,6.23 //
GP12visnup_u:12036: sa tvāmahaṃ haniṣyāmi na me jīvanvimokṣyase /
GP12visnup_u:12037: ātatāyyasi durbuddhe mama rājyaharo ripuḥ // ViP_6,6.24 //
GP12visnup_u:12040: na tvāṃ hantuṃ vicāryaitatkopaṃ bāṇaṃ vimuñca vā // ViP_6,6.25 //
GP12visnup_u:12045: hate 'smin pṛthivī sarvā tava vaśyā bhaviṣyati // ViP_6,6.27 //
GP12visnup_u:12047: hatesminpṛtivī sarvā mama vaśyā bhaviṣyati // ViP_6,6.28 //
GP12visnup_u:12049: na hanmi cellokajayo mama tasya vasuṃdharā // ViP_6,6.29 //
GP12visnup_u:12052: tasmānnainaṃ haniṣyāmi yatpṛcchati vadāmi tat // ViP_6,6.31 //
GP12visnup_u:12055: praṣṭavyaṃ yattvāya sarvaṃ tatpṛcchasva vadāmyaham // ViP_6,6.32 //
GP12visnup_u:12058: kathāṃyatvā sa papraccha prāyaśtittaṃ hi tadgatam // ViP_6,6.33 //
GP12visnup_u:12059: sa cācaṣṭa yathānyāyaṃ dvija keśidhvajāya tat /
GP12visnup_u:12062: yāgabhūmim upāgamya cakre sarvāḥ kriyāḥ kramāt // ViP_6,6.35 //
GP12visnup_u:12065: pūjitāś ca dvijāḥsarve sadasyā mānitā mayā /
GP12visnup_u:12068: aniṣpannakriyaṃ cetastathāpi mama kiṃ yathā // ViP_6,6.38 //
GP12visnup_u:12070: khāṇḍikyāya na datteti mayā vai gurudakṣiṇā // ViP_6,6.39 //
GP12visnup_u:12071: sa jagāma tadā bhūyo rathamāruhya pārthivaḥ /
GP12visnup_u:12072: maitreya durgagahanaṃ khāṇḍikyo yatra saṃsthitaḥ // ViP_6,6.40 //
GP12visnup_u:12074: tasthau hantuṃ kṛtamatistamāha sa punarnṛpaḥ // ViP_6,6.41 //
GP12visnup_u:12075: bho nāhaṃ te 'parādhāya prāptaḥ khāṇḍikya mā kruddhāḥ /
GP12visnup_u:12078: so 'haṃ te dātumicchāmi vṛṇīṣva gurudakṣiṇām // ViP_6,6.43 //
GP12visnup_u:12085: svalpakālaṃ mahīpālyaṃ mādṛśaiḥ prārthyate katham // ViP_6,6.46 //
GP12visnup_u:12087: paramārthaḥ kathaṃ ko 'tra yūyaṃ nātra vicakṣaṇāḥ // ViP_6,6.47 //
GP12visnup_u:12089: ityuktvā samupetyainaṃ sa tu keśidhvajaṃ nṛpaḥ /
GP12visnup_u:12090: uvāca kimavaśyaṃ tvaṃ dadāsi gurudakṣiṇām // ViP_6,6.48 //
GP12visnup_u:12101: keśidhvaja nibodha tvaṃ mayā na prārthitaṃ yataḥ /
GP12visnup_u:12108: anyeṣāṃ doṣaja saiva dharmaṃ vai nānurudhyate // ViP_6,7.5 //
GP12visnup_u:12110: ato na yācitaṃ rājyamavidyāntargataṃ tava // ViP_6,7.6 //
GP12visnup_u:12115: khāṇḍikyajanakaṃ prītyā śrūyatāṃ vacanaṃ mama // ViP_6,7.8 //
GP12visnup_u:12117: ahaṃ hyavidyayā kṛtyuṃ tartukāmaḥ karomi vai /
GP12visnup_u:12118: rājyaṃ yāgāṃś ca vividhānyogaiḥ puṇyakṣayaṃ tathā // ViP_6,7.9 //
GP12visnup_u:12119: tadidaṃ te mano diṣṭyā vivekaiśvaryatāṃ gatam /
GP12visnup_u:12126: ātmanyātmamayaṃ bhāvaṃ kaḥ karoti kalevare // ViP_6,7.13 //
GP12visnup_u:12128: adehe hyātmani prājñe mamedamiti manyate // ViP_6,7.14 //
GP12visnup_u:12132: dehaścānyo yadā puṃsastadā bandhāya tatparam // ViP_6,7.16 //
GP12visnup_u:12133: mṛṇmayaṃ hi yathā gehaṃ lipyate vai mṛdaṃbhasā /
GP12visnup_u:12136: āpyāyate yadi tataḥ puṃso bhogo 'tra kiṃ kṛtaḥ // ViP_6,7.18 //
GP12visnup_u:12140: tadā saṃsārapānthasya yāti mohaśramaḥ śamam // ViP_6,7.20 //
GP12visnup_u:12144: duḥkhājñānamayā dharmāḥ prakṛtes te tu nātmanaḥ // ViP_6,7.22 //
GP12visnup_u:12148: bhajate prākṛtān dharmān anyas tebhyo hi so 'vyayaḥ // ViP_6,7.24 //
GP12visnup_u:12150: kleśānāṃ ca kṣayakaraṃ yogādanyanna vidyate // ViP_6,7.25 //
GP12visnup_u:12156: yatra sthito na cyavate prāpya brahmalayaṃ muniḥ // ViP_6,7.27 //
GP12visnup_u:12158: bandhāya viṣayāsaṃgi muktyai nirviṣayaṃ manaḥ // ViP_6,7.28 //
GP12visnup_u:12164: tasya brahmaṇi saṃyogo yoga ityabhidhīyate // ViP_6,7.31 //
GP12visnup_u:12166: yasya yogaḥsa vai yogī mumukṣurabhidhīyate // ViP_6,7.32 //
GP12visnup_u:12170: janmāntarair abhyasato muktiḥ purvasya jāyate // ViP_6,7.34 //
GP12visnup_u:12174: seveta yogī niṣkāmo yogyatāṃ svamano nayan // ViP_6,7.36 //
GP12visnup_u:12177: ete yamāḥsaniyamāḥ pañca pañca ca kīrtitāḥ /

GP12visnup_u:12190: indriyāṇāmavaśyais tair na yogī yogasādhakaḥ // ViP_6,7.44 //
GP12visnup_u:12192: vaśīkṛte tataḥ kuryātsthitaṃ cetaḥ śubhāśraye // ViP_6,7.45 //
GP12visnup_u:12194: kathyatāṃ me mahābhāgā cetaso yaḥ śubhāśrayaḥ /
GP12visnup_u:12198: bhūpa mūrtamamūrtaṃ ca paraṃ cāparameva ca // ViP_6,7.47 //
GP12visnup_u:12200: brahmākhyā karmasaṃjñā ca tathā caivobhayātmikā // ViP_6,7.48 //
GP12visnup_u:12216: maruto vasavo rudrā bhāskarāstārakā grahāḥ // ViP_6,7.56 //
GP12visnup_u:12219: bhūpa bhūtānyaśeṣāṇi bhūtānāṃ ye ca hetavaḥ /
GP12visnup_u:12241: amūrtaṃ brahmaṇo rūpaṃ yat sad ityu cyate budhaiḥ // ViP_6,7.69 //
GP12visnup_u:12243: tadviśvarūpavairūpyaṃ rūpam anyad dharer mahat // ViP_6,7.70 //
GP12visnup_u:12253: kurvīta saṃsthitiṃ sā tu vijñeyā śuddhadhāraṇā // ViP_6,7.75 //
GP12visnup_u:12256: anye tu puruṣavyāghra cetaso ye vyāpāśrayāḥ /
GP12visnup_u:12259: eṣā vai dhāraṇa proktā yaccittaṃ tatra dhāryate // ViP_6,7.78 //
GP12visnup_u:12260: yacca mūrtaṃ hare rūpaṃ yādṛkcintyaṃ narādhipa /
GP12visnup_u:12276: nāpayāti yadā cittatsiddhāṃ manyeta tāṃ tadā // ViP_6,7.87 //
GP12visnup_u:12284: taddhyānaṃ prathamair aṅgaiḥ ṣaḍbhir niṣpādyate nṛpa // ViP_6,7.91 //
GP12visnup_u:12287: vijñānaṃ prāpakaṃ prāpye pare brahmaṇi pārthiva /
GP12visnup_u:12289: kṣetrajñaḥ karaṇī jñānaṃ karaṇaṃ tasya tena tat /
GP12visnup_u:12290: niṣpādya muktikāryaṃ vai kṛtakṛtyaṃ nivartate // ViP_6,7.94 //
GP12visnup_u:12292: bhavatyabhedī bhedaś ca tasyājñānakṛto bhavet // ViP_6,7.95 //
GP12visnup_u:12294: ātmano brahmaṇo bhedama saṃtaṃ kaḥ karīṣyati // ViP_6,7.96 //
GP12visnup_u:12303: paramārthastvasaṃlāpo gocare vacasāṃ na yaḥ // ViP_6,7.100 //
GP12visnup_u:12307: yathārhaṃ pūjayā tena khāṇḍikyena sa pūjitaḥ /
GP12visnup_u:12308: ājagāma puraṃ brahmaṃstataḥ keśidhvajo nṛpaḥ // ViP_6,7.102 //
GP12visnup_u:12312: viṣṇvākhye nirmale brahmaṇy avāpa nṛpatir layam // ViP_6,7.104 //
GP12visnup_u:12321: ātyantiko vimuktiryā layo brahmaṇi śāśvate // ViP_6,8.1 //
GP12visnup_u:12322: sargaś ca pratisargaś ca vaṃśamanvantarāṇi ca /
GP12visnup_u:12323: vaṃśānucaritaṃ caiva bhavato gaditaṃ mayā // ViP_6,8.2 //
GP12visnup_u:12327: yadanyadapi vaktavyaṃ tṛtpṛcchādya vadāmi te // ViP_6,8.4 //
GP12visnup_u:12330: śrutaṃ caitanmayā bhaktyā nānyatpraṣṭavyamasti me // ViP_6,8.5 //
GP12visnup_u:12333: jñātaś ca trividho rāśiḥ śaktiś ca trividhā guro /
GP12visnup_u:12334: vijñātā sā ca kārtsnyena trividhā bhāvabhāvanā // ViP_6,8.7 //
GP12visnup_u:12339: pravṛttaṃ ca nivṛttaṃ ca jñānaṃ karmamayākhilam /
GP12visnup_u:12342: tatkṣamyatāṃ viśeṣosti na satāṃ putraśiṣyayoḥ // ViP_6,8.11 //
GP12visnup_u:12346: sargaś ca pratisargaś ca vaṃśamanvantarāmi ca /
GP12visnup_u:12347: vaṃśānucaritaṃ kṛtsnaṃ mayātra tava kīrtitam // ViP_6,8.13 //
GP12visnup_u:12352: puṇyāḥ pradeśā medinyāḥ puṇyā nadyo 'tha sāgarāḥ /
GP12visnup_u:12353: parvatāś ca mahāpuṇyāścaritāni ca dhīmatām // ViP_6,8.16 //
GP12visnup_u:12363: prayāti vilayaṃ sadyaḥsakṛdyatra ca saṃsmṛte // ViP_6,8.21 //
GP12visnup_u:12365: pāvakair vasubhiḥ sādhyair viśvedevādibhiḥ suraiḥ // ViP_6,8.22 //
GP12visnup_u:12367: apsarobhis tathā tārānakṣatraiḥ sakalair grahaiḥ // ViP_6,8.23 //
GP12visnup_u:12369: brahmaṇādyair manuṣyaiś ca tathaiva paśubhir mṛgaiḥ // ViP_6,8.24 //
GP12visnup_u:12383: mathurāyāṃ hariṃ dṛṣṭvā prāpnoti puruṣaḥ phalam // ViP_6,8.31 //
GP12visnup_u:12387: jyeṣṭhāmūle site pakṣe dvādaśyāṃ samupoṣitaḥ // ViP_6,8.33 //
GP12visnup_u:12399: dattvā piṇḍaṃ pitṛbhyaś ca yamunāsalilāplutaḥ // ViP_6,8.39 //
GP12visnup_u:12407: ṛbhuḥ priyavratāyāha sa ca bhāguraye 'bavīt // ViP_6,8.43 //
GP12visnup_u:12412: tābhyāṃ ca nāgarājāya proktaṃ vāsukaye dvija /
GP12visnup_u:12413: vāsukiḥ prāha vatsāya vatsaścāśvatarāya vai // ViP_6,8.46 //
GP12visnup_u:12414: kaṃbalāya ca tenoktamelāputrāya tena vai // ViP_6,8.47 //
GP12visnup_u:12416: prāptavānetadakhilaṃ sa ca pramataye dadau // ViP_6,8.48 //
GP12visnup_u:12420: mayāpi tūbhyaṃ maitreya yathāvatkathitaṃ tbidam // ViP_6,8.50 //
GP12visnup_u:12423: yaḥ śṛṇoti naro bhaktyā sarvapāpaiḥ pramucyate // ViP_6,8.52 //
GP12visnup_u:12428: yastvetatsakalaṃ śṛṇotipuruṣaḥ kṛtvā manasyacyutaṃ sarvaṃ sarvamayaṃ samastajagatāmādhāramātmāśrayam /
GP12visnup_u:12429: jñānajñeyamanādimantarahitaṃ sarvāmarāṇāṃ hitaṃ sa prāpnoti na saṃśayostyavikalaṃ yadvājimedhe phalam // ViP_6,8.55 //
GP12visnup_u:12430: yatrādau bhagavāṃścarācaragururmadhye tathānte ca sa brahmajñānamayo 'cyuto 'khilajaganmadhyāntasargaprabhuḥ /
GP12visnup_u:12431: tatasarvaṃ puruṣaḥ pavitramamalaṃ śṛṇvanpaṭhanvācayanprāpnotyasti na tatphalaṃ tribhuvaneṣvekāntasiddhirhariḥ // ViP_6,8.56 //
GP12visnup_u:12432: yasminnyastamanirna yāti narakaṃ svargo 'pi yaccintane vighno yatra niveśitātmamanaso brāhmo 'pi loko 'lpakaḥ /
GP12visnup_u:12433: muktiṃ cetasi yaḥsthito maladhiyāṃ puṃsāṃ dadātyavyayaḥ kiṃ citraṃ yadaghaṃ prayāti vilayaṃ tatrācyute kīrtite // ViP_6,8.57 //
GP12visnup_u:12434: yajñair yajñavido yajanti satataṃ yajñeśvaraṃ karmiṇo yaṃ vai brahmamayaṃ parāvaramayaṃ dhyāyanti ca jñāninaḥ /
GP12visnup_u:12435: yaṃ saṃcitya na jāyate na mriyate no vardhate hīyate naivāsanna ca sadbhavatyati tataḥ kiṃ vā hareḥ śrūyatām // ViP_6,8.58 //
GP12visnup_u:12436: kavyaṃ yaḥ putṛrūpadhṛgvidhihutaṃ havyaṃ ca bhuktaṃ vibhurdevatve bhagavānanādinidhanaḥsāvahāsvadhāsaṃjñite /
GP12visnup_u:12437: yasminbrahmaṇi sarvaśaktinilaye mānāni no mānināṃ viṣṭhāyai prabhavanti hanti kaluṣaṃ śrotraṃ sa yāto hariḥ // ViP_6,8.59 //
GP12visnup_u:12438: nāntosti yasya na ca yasya samudbhavo 'sti vṛddhirna yasya pariṇāmavivarjitasya /
GP12visnup_u:12439: nāpakṣayaṃ ca samupaityavikāri vastu yastaṃ natosmi puruṣotmamīśamīḍyam // ViP_6,8.60 //
GP12visnup_u:12440: tasyaiva yonu gumabhugbahudhaika eva suddhopyaśuddha iva bhāti hi mūrtibhedaiḥ /
GP12visnup_u:12441: jñānānvitaḥsakalasattvavibhūtikartā tasmai namostu puruṣāya sadāvyayāya // ViP_6,8.61 //
GP12visnup_u:12443: avyākṛtāya bhavabāvanakāraṇāya vande svarūpabhavanāya sadājarāya // ViP_6,8.62 //
GP12visnup_u:12445: puṃsaḥsamastakaraṇair upakārakāya vyaktāya sūkṣmabṛhadātmavate natosmi // ViP_6,8.63 //
GP12visnup_u:12446: iti vividhamajasya yasya rūpaṃ prakṛtiparātmamayaṃ sanātanasya /
